My analysis for the Fragile Families and Child Wellbeing Study compared gradient boosting algorithms to model six key metrics: GPA, grit, material hardship, layoff, eviction, and job training. Using interpretable methods, the study delves into eviction cases.

Code: [https://github.com/belisards/ff_applied_ml/](https://github.com/belisards/ff_applied_ml/))

[Paper](https://github.com/belisards/belisards.github.io/blob/main/publications/files/fragile_families.pdf)
